mBitmapTextureFormat

private final BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat mBitmapTextureFormat
Constructor Detail

BitmapTextureAtlas

public BitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                          int pHeight)
Uses BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).

BitmapTextureAtlas

public BitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                          int pHeight,
                          BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat pBitmapTextureFormat)
Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pBitmapTextureFormat - use BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT with transparency and BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGB_565 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT without transparency.

BitmapTextureAtlas

public BitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                          int pHeight,
                          ITextureAtlas.ITextureAtlasStateListener<IBitmapTextureAtlasSource> pTextureAtlasStateListener)
Uses BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureStateListener - to be informed when this BitmapTextureAtlas is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureAtlasSource failed to load.

BitmapTextureAtlas

public BitmapTextureAtlas(int pWidth,
                          int pHeight,
                          BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat pBitmapTextureFormat,
                          ITextureAtlas.ITextureAtlasStateListener<IBitmapTextureAtlasSource> pTextureAtlasStateListener)
Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pBitmapTextureFormat - use BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT with transparency and BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGB_565 for BitmapTextureAtlasMAGIC_CONSTANT without transparency.
pTextureAtlasStateListener - to be informed when this BitmapTextureAtlas is loaded, unloaded or a ITextureAtlasSource failed to load.

                          int pHeight,
                          TextureOptions pTextureOptions)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Uses BitmapTexture.BitmapTextureFormat.RGBA_8888.

Parameters:
pWidth - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pHeight - must be a power of 2 (i.e. 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024).
pTextureOptions - the (quality) settings of the BitmapTexture.
